00025 #ifndef __MLPACK_CORE_SFINAE_UTILITY
00026 #define __MLPACK_CORE_SFINAE_UTILITY
00027 
00028 #include <boost/utility/enable_if.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/type_traits.hpp>
00030 #include <mlpack/prereqs.hpp>
00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Constructs a template supporting the SFINAE pattern.
00034  *
00035  * This macro generates a template struct that is useful for enabling/disabling
00036  * a method if the template class passed in contains a member function matching
00037  * a given signature with a specified name.
00038  *
00039  * The generated struct should be used in conjunction with boost::disable_if and
00040  * boost::enable_if. Here is an example usage:
00041  *
00042  * For general references, see:
00043  * http://stackoverflow.com/a/264088/391618
00044  *
00045  * For an MLPACK specific use case, see /mlpack/core/util/prefixedoutstream.hpp
00046  * and /mlpack/core/util/prefixedoutstream_impl.hpp
00047  *
00048  * @param NAME the name of the struct to construct. For example: HasToString
00049  * @param FUNC the name of the function to check for. For example: ToString
00050  */
00051 #define HAS_MEM_FUNC(FUNC, NAME)                                               \
00052 template<typename T, typename sig>                                             \
00053 struct NAME {                                                                  \
00054   typedef char yes[1];                                                         \
00055   typedef char no [2];                                                         \
00056   template<typename U, U> struct type_check;                                   \
00057   template<typename _1> static yes &chk(type_check<sig, &_1::FUNC> *);         \
00058   template<typename   > static no  &chk(...);                                  \
00059   static bool const value = sizeof(chk<T>(0)) == sizeof(yes);                  \
00060 };
00061 
00062 #endif
